showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ I booked a shower at 2.30 am in the morning after waiting 30 minutes I went inside and requested them to clean the shower firstly, they lied to me that all the shower are being used ,On the other hand they were not willing to clean it I ‚Ä¶

People polite workers that is shower was ok bottom half toilet hadnt beened cleaned in a while but ive seen worse the wendys pretty good staff very polite even did bacon extra crispy for my burger np so over all pretty good not best but not ‚Ä¶

Good parking space clean restrooms but i was there for shower and waited 40 minutes inside the store because i was the next customer in line. The lady working at showers waited for all 5 showers to be free to get them ready again. 2 were ‚Ä¶

I wish I had believed the reviews about how disgustingly dirty the showers are. When I complained to the trans person in attendance that my shower was dirty it gave me another that was even more disgusting. When I pointed that out it took a ‚Ä¶

I like this love's the store is clean and the showers are also clean. The parking lot is not the biggest and fills up quickly. The only complaint I would have is I wish they would fix the faucets in sink in the shower rooms the water gets ‚Ä¶

They have everything you need, but there was some confusion regarding showers. We booked a shower and got the shower pin through the Love's app, so my husband paid for that and a drink refill, and as he walked to get the refill, the towel/ ‚Ä¶

Otrs. If you're moving and need a quick clean shower and a hot burger from Wendy's here's the place. Between 1-3pm Wyoming time you can be in and out and under an hour. Staff actually care about the truckers here. ( personal experience )

Excellent Pilot, clean, bright, comfortable.  Incredibly friendly staff.  The shower deserves special praise.  12 showers.  The water pressure and temperature are some of the best I've seen.
A good piolt truck stop nice view and they have a sidewalk that you could Walk your dog üê∂üêï we stay the weekend and left Monday. Recommend and the shower üëçüèø ‚Ä¶

It was rosaceted that there was no paper at all in the women's toilet and it was dirty .. all the necessary urgent tools for transport can be found here.  you can still eat if you wish .. and the shower is more or less cleaned
Everything one might need at the truck stop plus more to include Dennys Dining. Pizza slices are good after the shower.
You have to wait for hours to get a shower and  the people work there they really don‚Äôt care

This is the cleanest shower room I ever been in that I had to leave a tip. I never done that before!

Also easy parking if you get here before 6pm

You can't get into the shower!
The work is not organized at all.

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a great place to stop, eat, refuel, buy souvenirs, stretch after a long drive, take a restroom break, and get a super tasty creamy ice cream cone for 75 cents!! ‚Ä¶

The first bad experience I've ever had at any of the Little Americas. Taking shower and I'm pretty quick to shower maybe 10 min in and out. The old lady behind counter comes ans knocks on door and says you need to hurry up. Okay, so now i ‚Ä¶

Small lot filled with ABF trailers. Only 2 showers working, didn't have towels. Didn't offer a discount or anything. Showers say premium on the billboard, but they're average run of the mill truck stop showers. Staff rude and unhelpful.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ guy behind the register. They looked @ me and continued on with their conversation. Booked a shower on my phone and after that I left. I been here before some people greet you others look at you as if your crazy. Food is decent but always ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ do I have any intentions of ever returning.  I was at this location to take a shower & because I was in the bathroom for so long the staff called the police on me and said I was trespassing.  I was approached by police in the parking lot ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ We have gotten two showers originally and we‚Äôre waiting for to open, one has opened and we were asking the lady at the register to give us one big shower and that would be okay. ‚Ä¶

So my boyfriend is a semi driver we stopped here for a shower, and ket me begin to say the shower looked nasty there was brown shit on the ground trash wasn't taken out, and the showers were lukewarm at ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Also waited 40 minutes for them to have a shower room cleaned for me, 2 people cleaning them just sitting in there break closet chatting for an excessive amount of times while they have 4 showers that needed to be cleaned
Title: Terrible Shower Service ‚Ä¶
Slow and stupid..... they couldn't figure out how to pull a shower off my card while 4 other people got on line.

What happened to Pilots?   My 5th Pilot in a row with an 30 min to an hour line for shower.  Showers are open everywhere, but no one is cleaning them.   Maybe it's time to go back to fueling at TA/Petro

Not only are the potholes in the parking lot large enough to look like a moonscape, but the staff can‚Äôt be bothered to clean showers. Was informed it would be a 3 hour wait AFTER my shower was cancelled twice with no explanation. It‚Äôs a ‚Ä¶

Horrible. Everytime I come thru here and stop to shower it is over an hour wait to get into one, and thats if you're lucky. I don't know if it's showers being down or just plain and simple laziness, but this is absolutely ridiculous. The ‚Ä¶

ABF uses this parking lot as their own drop lot. No parking for others. All I wanted to do was take a shower after fueling. No place to park other than the fuel island. Worst Little America ive been to for trucks. To my fellow OTR guys. Don ‚Ä¶

Tons of signs for luxurious trucker showers $18 ... I've been in no name truck stop with cleaner and nicer facilities the shower room was tiny not so much as a towel run over the counter since whoever showered before us. Toilet was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to trucks, it's catered to tourists. They have the fueling islands with a little store where you can shower (wonderful bathrooms btw), but the big store and restaurant etc is away from truck parking. (No trucks allowed) you have to walk ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and when they are cought they try to take it out on the truck drivers.  I hope there is no future problems like the one i had this afternoon.  There is cheep fuel, clean shower, a nice golf course, and a restaurant/bar in the hotel.

‚Ä¶ ok. I came before and got to take a nice bath, with bubble bath. And I was so disappointed to see the ‚ôø shower where the water runs on the floor. Had to put towels down so it wouldn't  go on the carpet it was all the same level.  And I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ 2) Shower looks nice with marble wall n floor. However NO ventilation n its like a Sauna. ‚Ä¶

If you want to come here and drop 12$ for a shower, just to have the extremely rude cashier huff, stomp and slam cupboards and make you feel totally unwelcome  because he has to go clean one of the showers for you... My husband and I put up ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ parking lot has holes big enough for truck to fall thru. Broke my welding on metal bumper...showers are nasty, first shower had hair all over floor and some on toilet seat. Asked for new shower, something floors was just washed and hair ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ No water No restroom No shower, nothing. As of 7/31/25  there's issues with whoever runs this place not just with restrooms! ‚Ä¶

Very clean, Burger King was good.  shower was clean and the lady cleaning them was very nice.   I could get two truckers to pee on me and get more pressure and soap off of me than that shower did.  Very disappointed I wasted a shower credit ‚Ä¶

Finally this one got renovated
New shower
Burger king
Taco bell
Country pride

‚Ä¶ the restroom and for the record, I am a female. On this day, the women's restroom was shut down and it had a note saying that showers one and two we're being used for the women's restroom. I went back, and the Porter had shut down those two ‚Ä¶

+ freshly made renovation, beautiful colors.
- there are not enough clothes hooks in the shower cabins, at least 4 are needed!

So don't shower here professional drivers. The showers aren't clean. There is no on-site manager so employees kinda do what they want or argue like children. I even spoke to a manager named Katie by phone about my issues. I was told my ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ job! Typical TA inside with normal stock. Bathrooms were alright. However did take a shower a few months ago and they were really nice with awesome pressure. That's what the second star is for. But the showers are not worth tearing your ‚Ä¶
Showers bad just as other TA/Petros. Whoever owns this business does not care about customer satisfaction. Shower 6 has no place to put the soap on.
This TA is a comfortable one with newer shower, exercise room, plenty of fast food choices. However when it comes to laundry I advise against doing laundry here. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: And I ended up having the wheelchair accessible shower which was humongous three people can take a shower at the same time . It has a bathtub and a very large shower . And they always have clean showers and bathrooms sometimes you don't ‚Ä¶

Best Sapp Bros location I've been to!  Nicest showers I've ever used of any truck stop I've been to in America (probably 200 different ones). Very good service!  Nicest truck stop I'm Wyoming for sure.  The couples shower is highly ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ For travels the showers and restrooms are very clean. ‚Ä¶
This location is amazing. Store was super clean, employees friendly & I love that they had a couple‚Äôs shower as my husband and I drive together. Keep up the good work guys!

Nice staff. Private shower rooms are VERY nice. Way better than the other major fuel stations. They had a large walk in shower, large area for toilet, sink, bench, wall hooks. It was extremely clean, I mean not even water spots on the ‚Ä¶

I usually stop in at night, it's quieter. However went there this morning for a shower, and the morning shift staff are quite snobby and rude. Definitely gonna file a complaint with management, won't be the first time.Supposed to be family ‚Ä¶

Last time I took a shower here, the showers were over in the motel.
Now they are in the building and they are nice! One of the nicest showers I've had in a while. Well worth the $15.

‚Ä¶ go to Sapp Brothers frequently as we are on the road alot.  This one in particular has very clean restrooms/shower room with nice heavy towels, the staff is friendly.  We've eaten in the restaurant twice and I would say it's a little ‚Ä¶

Parking fills up fast in the lot, just swing around and park on the huge shoulder across from the place. Nice restaurant inside. One of the best steaks you'll ever eat at T-Joes next door.

No longer have bidet toilets in the shower rooms.

Vegas-style shower (couples shower) with dual sinks, bathtub, and dual shower heads. Attentive waitress in the restaurant. Good home-cooked style food. Steakhouse/saloon next door with a great selection of Wyoming whiskies, excellent ‚Ä¶
